text: Ani asa prakare adani-asiksita lokadekhila mhanale ki svatah allaha amacyasi sambhasana ka nahi karita kinva amacyajavala ekhadi nisani ka nahi yeta. Asa prakarace kathana tyancya purvicya lokannihi kele hote, tyanci ani yanci mane ekasamana jhalita. Amhi tara visvasa (srad'dha) thevanaryankarita nisanyance nivedana kele ahe
